Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Area @Template[type:line|distance:20]

Defense Reflex

You fire a blast ahead of you, dealing @Damage[20d10[fire]] damage to enemies in the area. This fire damage negates all resistances and immunities to fire. Those affected must make a @Check[type:reflex|against:limit-dc] save.

Critical Success The target takes minimum damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Success The target takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Failure The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for [[/r 1d6 #rounds]].
